import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
    int[] d = new int[(int)1e6 + 1];
    double log = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= (int)1e6; i++) {
      log += Math.log10(i);
      d[i] = (int)(log + 1);
    }
    int t = in.nextInt();
    for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
      int x = in.nextInt();
      System.out.println(d[x]);
    }
  }
}
